page.title: 11Industry.
page.content: Stainforth Fashion Industries employ 160(14 men and 146 women).They make blouses,trousers,skirts and suits.They supply middle to lower range shops. Walker and Kitching have been in Stainforth for 4 years,since they moved from Balby.They employ 2 women and 20 men.They work a 39 hour week. They make counters and fittings for clubs and pubs. Diamond Upholstery started their business in Stainforth 9 years ago. They are a family corncern of 3 men and 2 women.They work 12 hours a day. They renovate furniture if possible. Customers are recommended by word of mouth.
